channel.title: Full Historical Archive of Original TorBOX Project Site
channel.description:
Dear Whonix community...
After an exchange with Patrick a few weeks ago, I've begun plowing into some work to help further enhance the historical integrity and verification of Whonix. More on that in an upcoming future posting.
As part of this work, I am happy to report to you that I was able to preserve what is likely a full permanent historical archive of the original TorBOX project site, on the torproject.org wiki, where Whonix first got its humble beginnings.
Here is the URL of the original TorBOX wiki site:
https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX
I was able to write and run a script to automatically archive all of the TorBOX wiki pages and each page's detailed history, with the following 3 public archiving sites:
- Archive.org - Archive.is - WebCitation.org
I've only done a very brief check to see that the archives were generally going through successfully. That means that there could possibly be some holes in the archives, but, overall, it seems that each TorBOX page probably ended getting successfully archived with at least one or more of the services I mentioned.
Here are some links to where most of the pages in the public TorBOX archives are:
https://web.archive.org/web/*/https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX
https://web.archive.org/web/*/https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX*
https://web.archive.org/web/*/https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/*
https://archive.is/https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX
https://archive.is/https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX*
https://archive.is/https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/*
http://webcitation.org/query.php?url=https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX
Here is a dump of all of the original TorBOX primary page URLs that I archived:
70 total primary pages...
[code] https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/ApplicationWarningsAndNotes https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/Authorship https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/BareMetalHints https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/Changelog https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/DISCLAIMER https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/DesignDocument https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/DesignDocumentBase https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/Dev https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/Dev/ArchivedDiscussion https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/Dev/ArchivedDiscussion/DOCUMENTATION https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/Dev/ArchivedDiscussion/INFRASTRUCTURE https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/Dev/ArchivedDiscussion/MISC https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/Dev/ArchivedDiscussion/OPTIONALFEATURE https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/Dev/ArchivedDiscussion/QUESTIONS https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/Dev/ArchivedDiscussion/SECURITY https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/Dev/ArchivedDiscussion/SHELLSCRIPTS https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/Dev/Build https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/Dev/BuildDocumentation https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/Dev/BuildDocumentation/0.1.3 https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/Dev/BuildDocumentation/0.2.1 https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/Dev/BuildDocumentation/0.3.0 https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/Dev/BuildScript https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/Dev/ChangeRoot https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/Dev/Chroot https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/Dev/ClientVM https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/Dev/CreateVM https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/Dev/Debootstrap https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/Dev/GetISO https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/Dev/HardenedGentooTG https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/Dev/Image https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/Dev/ModifyISO https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/Dev/MountVDI https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/Dev/RelatedTickets https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/Dev/ScriptSnippets https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/Dev/TGScript https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/Dev/TWScript https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/Dev/TorBOX-Vbox https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/Dev/timesync https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/Dev/torcheck https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/Download https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/FAQ https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/Firewall https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/History https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/HowToInstall https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/LeakTests https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/LeakTestsOld https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/ManualConfiguration https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/OneVM https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/OptionalConfigurations https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/OptionalConfigurations/TunnelingUDPoverTor https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/OtherAnonymizingNetworks https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/OtherOperatingSystems https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/PPTP https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/Readme https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/SecurityAndHardening https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/ShellScript https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/SimilarProjects https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/TestAndTroubleshoot https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/TorBox.org https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/Trust https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/Update https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/Update/TBB https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/VMware https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/XChat https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/XChatDefaultConfigurationFiles https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/bridges https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/defunct https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX/thttpd https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/proper [/code]
Here is a dump of all of the original TorBOX history page URLs that I archived:
9,131 total history pages...
Too large for Whonix forum. See paste link:
https://defuse.ca/b/xLqSzvYt
https://archive.is/DHZNU
http://www.webcitation.org/6OSsi0D73
I'm happy to have ensured that the historical beginnings of the Whonix project are now archived permanently.
A big thanks to Patrick and team for the years put into such a novel and valuable piece of free software. :)

item.title: Full Historical Archive of Original TorBOX Project Site
item.dc:creator: whonix-supporter
item.description:
Dear Patrick,

Quite welcome! Happy to do it.

Read full topic
item.source: Full Historical Archive of Original TorBOX Project Site

item.description:
Dear Whonix community…

After an exchange with Patrick a few weeks ago, I’ve begun plowing into some work to help further enhance the historical integrity and verification of Whonix. More on that in an upcoming future posting.

As part of this work, I am happy to report to you that I was able to preserve what is likely a full permanent historical archive of the original TorBOX project site, on the torproject.org wiki, where Whonix first got its humble beginnings.

Here is the URL of the original TorBOX wiki site:

https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX

I was able to write and run a script to automatically archive all of the TorBOX wiki pages and each page’s detailed history, with the following 3 public archiving sites:

  • Archive.org
  • Archive.is
  • WebCitation.org

I’ve only done a very brief check to see that the archives were generally going through successfully. That means that there could possibly be some holes in the archives, but, overall, it seems that each TorBOX page probably ended getting successfully archived with at least one or more of the services I mentioned.

Here are some links to where most of the pages in the public TorBOX archives are:

https://web.archive.org/web/*/https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/wiki/doc/TorBOX

Too large for Whonix forum. See paste link:

https://defuse.ca/b/xLqSzvYt

archive.is – 30 Mar 14

Defuse Security's Encrypted Pastebin

archived 30 Mar 2014 17:17:49 UTC

http://www.webcitation.org/6OSsi0D73

I’m happy to have ensured that the historical beginnings of the Whonix project are now archived permanently.

A big thanks to Patrick and team for the years put into such a novel and valuable piece of free software.
